subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Nicole Hosp of Austria raced to her first women’s World Cup slalom victory of the season Sunday, beating Tanja Poutiainen of Finland by 1.19 seconds in Aspen, Colo.
snippet: Nicole Hosp of Austria raced to her first women’s World Cup slalom victory of the season Sunday, beating Tanja Poutiainen of Finland by 1.19 seconds in Aspen, Colo.
